Text: Awesome, thanks for posting this.  Slow download though, so I can't rate it yet.
I am sorry I have slow bandwidth, but I do what I can.

For those wondering, this version has the choppy frame rate the other versions have.  It's been re-encoded to 29.97fps which makes the file size larger, but of course it doesn't improve the frame rate.  Aside from the frame rate issue the quality is good.
Agree with enonumus... currently there is no proper HQ release of this :(

There won't be, dudes, it's a stream, streams are not high quality.

Sad.

There's actually a 1080p version with constant 30fps available on some other torrent site.

proof : http://i.imgur.com/whPpd.jpg

Compression is still far from flawless though.

So wait for this or maybe also a proper 30fps 720p.
